kunyomiExamples.meaning: to blame, to reproach, to censure, to rebuke, to reprove, to find fault, to take to task, to criticize, to criticise, to question (a suspect), to challenge, to aggravate (an injury), to be aggravated, to get inflamed, to prick (one's conscience)
error, mistake, fault, sin, wrongdoing, offense

to blame, to reproach, to censure, to rebuke, to reprove, to find fault, to take to task, to criticize, to criticise, to question (a suspect), to challenge, to aggravate (an injury), to be aggravated, to get inflamed, to prick (one's conscience)
it's not my fault, this red face is the alcohol's fault

vietnameseMeaning: ① Xấu, hưu cữu 休咎 tốt xấu. ② Lỗi, như cữu vô khả từ 咎無可辭 lỗi không khá từ. ③ Một âm là cao, cũng như chữ cao 皐. ① Tội, lỗi: 歸咎於人 Đổ tội cho người khác; ② Trách móc, xử phạt, kể tội: 既往不咎 Không kể tội những việc đã qua; ③ (văn) Xấu: 休咎 Tốt xấu; ④ (văn) Tai hoạ: 諸侯必叛，君必有咎 Chư hầu ắt làm phản, vua ắt có tai hoạ (Tả truyện).
